amendment.description: Amendment provides for inclusion of border security activities to the list of preferred applications the Department of Defense considers when transferring excess property to other federal agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCaul amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 166 (Roll no. 232).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. McCaul.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCaul amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 166 (Roll no. 232).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
